Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The name of the collector that should be used.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Configuration parameter for the chosen collector. For standard collectors, the syntax is: [path]|[resource type]|[count] to specifiy from wich folder (path) how many (count) resources of which type (resource type) should be collected.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Set this attribute to true, to enable the direct edit option for the list (entries can directly be added, removed or edited).
